abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective Basic
            Education Project (BEP) for Sudan is to increase access to
            improved basic education in four selected states in northern
            Sudan. This request is to restructure and amend the grant
            agreement (the agreement) for the BEP in order to: (i)
            extend the closing date of the BEP by 12 months from June
            30, 2011 to June 30, 2012; (ii) amend the institutional
            arrangements related to procurement and civil works
            supervision aspects of the project; (iii) revise some of the
            targets related to the project development objective (PDO)
            indicators; and (iv) reallocate the grant proceeds amongst
            the categories of expenditures.
